title: Design-Based Research Application for Online Transdisciplinary Technology (T-Skill) Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Proficiency in Online Learning Tools and Fundamental Knowledge in Social Sciences
context.additional_context: Mobile-based formative assessment-centered training for current industry professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can develop a project plan utilizing collaborative skills applicable across various academic disciplines within two weeks.
Learners achieve over 80% accuracy by applying critical thinking skills acquired through microlearning modules to real-world case analyses.
Learners systematically document and evaluate their creative problem-solving processes via reflective journaling provided in a mobile environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
